title: Tighter LCR norms: Banks to provide feedback by August-end
description: The RBI's new norms essentially translate into a greater requirement for banks to deploy more funds in HQLA, which could be quickly liquidated in a hypothetical stress episode where lenders offering internet and mobile banking facilities are faced with quick fund withdrawals or transfers.
